name: Duet of War
description:
From the GMTK Jam 2021 under the theme "Bound Together".

Credits:

[Idea & Design]

/@BananaBoat

Gabriel Timoteo / @gabrieltim

Shaun

Duet of War is tactics game where you take part in tactical battles using batallions of units to move around a hex map to conquer and destroy your enemies. Your units are bound together and must move as one entity, sharing stats and skills. Different tile types affect your batallions in a different way, from hindering accuracy, slowing movement, or in some cases even give you an advantage in battle.
